EmailTemplate.subject: Associate Mentor Application - Important Updates!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Associate Mentor Application 2016
Hey {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for submitting your Associate Mentor application - we are very excited to know that your interested in volunteering on the National Citizen Service programme this year!
Please ensure you have completed the following tasks to prepare you for your role (if you haven't already):
1) Assessment Events (Deadline Thursday 26th of May at Midday) Please ensure that you have registered to come to an assessment event. These are taking place throughout half term and will give you an overview to the role, training on how to excel in your position, and you will meet the staff team!
Click here to register for an assessment event!
If you can not attend the listed events we have a few spaces at our back up training events on 15/06/2016 and 29/06/2016 between 17:00 and 20:00 in Waterloo. If you would like to attend a back up training event please email rhiannon.downer@the-challenge.org.
2) Provisional Allocation (Deadline Thursday 26th of May at Midday) We have started provisionally allocating all applicants to waves over summer. If you could complete the following short form - we can reserve you on the wave(s) at the best time and location for you.
Click here to complete the provisional allocation form!
3) If your going to be 18 or over by the end of August... You will need to have a Disclosure and Barring Service Check (DBS). These could take up to 12 weeks to process so get yours started now! Click here for information!
If you have any questions do get in touch with Rhiannon on rhiannon.downer@the-challenge.org or call 07876836445.
See you at the assessments!
